identity.name: Fat and Slim
identity.description: A dual-mode aesthetic that shifts between 'Organic Freshness' (Light Mode) for nutrition and 'Cyber Focus' (Dark Mode) for training. It avoids generic health app tropes by mixing high-precision data visualization with raw, gritty textures.

usage.headings: Use Manrope for all standard headings. Use Bebas Neue ONLY for timer countdowns, intense workout stats, or 'GO' buttons.
usage.body: Inter for all readable text. Keep line-height loose (1.6) for readability.

primary.description: Vibrant Lime - The core energy color. Works as 'Fresh' in light mode and 'Neon' in dark mode.

secondary.description: Electric Purple - Reserved exclusively for AI features (Scanner, Smart Plans) and Premium upgrades.

accent.description: Vitality Orange - Used for food/nutrition highlights and warnings.

background.description: Slate 50 for Light (Clean/Medical), Slate 900 for Dark (Focus/Night).

surface.description: Card backgrounds. In dark mode, use slight transparency.

buttons.fab: fixed bottom-20 right-4 h-14 w-14 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-lg flex items-center justify-center z-50

inputs.default: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-lg h-12

navigation.mobile_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-16 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-border flex justify-around items-center z-50
navigation.desktop_sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 h-screen border-r border-border bg-card p-6

textures.noise: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-0

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

hero.description: Atmospheric runner on foggy path - represents the journey.

nutrition.description: Fresh, vibrant, overhead shots of healthy food.

fitness.description: Contrast between intense gym lighting and calm home yoga.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a PWA. Focus on mobile responsiveness first. Use the 'Bio-Kinetic' theme: Fresh/Organic for nutrition pages, Dark/Neon for workout pages.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Do not use standard list views where a grid could be more visual.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components. Do not use the default black/white styles. Inject the Primary Lime (#C2F970) into active states.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Style them minimally. Remove grid lines where possible. Use the Primary and Secondary colors for data series.
instructions_to_main_agent.scanner: For the food scanner, create a camera overlay with a scanning animation (moving line). Use the 'Electric Purple' color here to signify AI.
instructions_to_main_agent.gamification: Make badges feel tangible. Use 3D-like shadows or gradients for them.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ü§ñüß†üí≠üí°üîÆüéØüìöüé≠üé¨üé™üéâüéäüéÅüéÄüéÇüç∞üéàüé®üé∞üí∞üíµüí≥üè¶üíéü™ôüí∏ü§ëüìäüìàüìâüíπüî¢üèÜü•á etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
